meanings.definition: The quality or state of being extremely unpleasant or causing great discomfort.
meanings.sent1: The awfulness of the situation made everyone feel sad.
meanings.sent2: The awfulness of the smell in the room was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: Despite the awfulness of the weather, they decided to go for a walk.
meanings.sent4: The awfulness of the news hit her like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The awfulness of the haunted house made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: An instance or example of something that is very bad or unpleasant.
meanings.sent1: The movie was an awfulness that no one wanted to watch again.
meanings.sent2: The awfulness of the food at the restaurant was disappointing.
meanings.sent3: The awfulness of the joke made everyone laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: The awfulness of the mistake was like a dark cloud hanging over him.
meanings.sent5: The awfulness of the traffic made him late for the meeting.
